Name: Tiamat's Drink
About the game: Tiamat’s Drink is a hardcore vertical shoot ’em up roguelike game inspired by the 16-bit era consoles. Fight against powerful enemies, defeat unique bosses, unlock challenging levels and obtain extra powers! So get ready and don't forget to enjoy our exclusive soundtrack! Features: 24 Zones levels. 9 Boss Battles. Unique music designed for each level and boss. Random enemies through levels. Unique generated dungeon levels. Great replay value. Well-designed learning curve. Great Soundtrack including 30+ pieces of music. Multiplayer local co-op.
